entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Sechelt
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:42 PM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sechelt 3:00 PM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: 6.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 6.5°C
Wind: SSW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind light except southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h late this afternoon. High 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light overnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022
